title: Please league-senpai teach me the error of my ways!
body:
Please, show me what a true S+ looks like, so I can bask in its glory, and repent for the clear errors I made in this game. 

I have failed you, I only had 92% kill participation, 8% short of your expectation!. Please let me humbly fall upon my sword for disgracing you so!

Im sorry I was so selfish, I should have thrown myself into the enemy team and died with honour, allowing them shut-down gold, instead of maintaining my perfect game.

I had 1 CS less than our ADC, please accept my humblest apologies, I know you can not abide your students being second best. I prioritised farming champions over minions. I have desecrated your teachings! 

I know excuses are meaningless at this point, but I swear I would have had more CS if Garen, Kai'sa and myself hadn't had to permanently follow Tryndamere around wherever he went to 3v1 him to stop him shredding our team and objectives, and even then either Garen or Kai'sa _(often both)_ had to give their lives before he could finally be slain, even in a 3v1. I failed to protect them, I don't even deserve to stand before you now..

Please show me what an S+ is supposed to be, so I can redeem my failings and bring honour to my family.

{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body:
Lol i did way less to get an s+ on the old swain( from memory 6/0/10 with about 200 ish cs in a 30 minute game.)

Its probably got to do with the re release being played more.bad luck i geuss

You placed 1 Control Ward all game.

You only destroyed one ward all game.

You had 6.3 CS/min. That's Jg level CS, not Mid lane.

You only destroyed 2 of the 10 towers your team took.

You didn't get first blood.

Your damage to objectives was lower than many of the others.

You gained absolutely NO stats from Transcendence.

Phase Rush was only activated 36 times.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'm not hating. You certainly deserve an S+ with your performance. The things I stated are the over-the-top picky stuff that, knowing Riot, is probably what you need. I think it was the fact you only destroyed 1 ward and 2 towers, as well as your CS and objective damage.

But literally every other stat was brilliant. In fact, MY S+ games have worse stats. **The only stats that were considerably different was Vision Score** (I had a higher score even though the game was almost half the time), and the fact that I have **much better CS/min** even though I'm a Jungler. Not only that, but my high CS was due to counter-jungling, which put my direct opponent many levels behind.

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

There's no point placing another control ward when your first one still lives and provides vision in an important area, that's a waste of gold?

Once you're that far ahead, using your time and abilities to farm CS is a waste of your lead, when you can be using it to win fights and let other less fed champs have the CS.

My objective damage was low because I was the only one who stood a chance against Tryndamere (and even then I couldn't do it alone), so my job was pretty much to keep Trynd busy so my team could push and take objectives.

I'm sorry I couldn't active phase rush more because we killed enemy champs too fast...

Im not saying I'm good, I'm lucky I could pick up early kills and snowball,  but there is a lot of variables in league, and the game shouldn't rank you on such specific things. "Sorry you didn't get first blood, no S+ for you! What's that? The enemy wasn't good enough to find and kill your control ward? No S+ for you!"

KDA isn't everything! I'll be the first to say that.
But when you get an anomalous score like that... that should just override the system.

I dont know. Are you showing off yourself in forum ? Faker dosent get S plus in most of the game and we all know that you just have to be good enough and do right things for a particular one that you play. But as mid laners you couldve bought extra control wards and place in enemy jg and could give her jungler much worse time. But for someone  saying getting vision is a waste of gold, I will not definitely give you S plus.

Yes, because everyone here knows me as a show off? xD
90% of my posts are about me struggling.

I don't care about Faker, he plays a different game than I do, I'm not going to compare myself to him when we don't even play the same game?

What? I don't think you understand.

I had a control ward, that lasted for most of the game, I placed it in a spot where we critically needed vision, and for some reason they never found it _(or if they did, they didnt destroy it.)_

Why would I buy another control ward _(using up gold)_ to place in another spot, which would destroy the one I already had, causing us to lose vision in that important spot?

Its common sense man..

and It's not like we were lacking on vision _(You think I had no deaths by not knowing where the enemy team was?)_
In any case, their jungler was in our jungle most of the time in early game. Us having some trinkets in our own jungle early let us catch him out a lot.

Well you keep saying you placed a ward in important spot and i wonder how it never gets destroyed during a entire game???? Say if u placed a control ward in a small bush around dragon or baron pits which are important spots for both teams, how it is even possible that the ward just stays there forever. Also important spot in a game keep changes  depends what your teams focus is atm. Moreover, sometimes you place an extra control ward to make sure enemy team do not have a vision around a certain area when your lens is on cd. Placed a ward around an important spot and it never gets destroyed during a entire game??? Idk man i find it strange.

> how it is even possible that the ward just stays there forever.

_Youre right of course_, it's **mathematically impossible** for a ward to stay un-destroyed for a large chunk of the game. 

Good spotting 99!

Probably was your total ward count.
{{summoner:3}}

How do you go 8/8 as Varus?

huh
You be in the same game as Tryndamere?
